@string/title_wait_a_while

Sure, you have probably noticed that the app is now translated into your mother tongue.

We are happy to announce you that we have worked last months in order to translate the app to offer you an even better experience ðŸ™‚.

However, before continuing, you can choose to get more information about what was translated or even how to adapt part of your current quiz creation.
Does the translation of the application help you?

Is our latest update on app translation helping?

Please, if you appreciate our effort in translating this app into your mother tongue, please support and encourage our work by rating the app 5 stars on GooglePlay.

It will be a great support that will encourage us to go further. ðŸ™‚
Change app language !
If you are willing to change or restore app language, you can click here to open settings options and select your preferred language.

Great, welcome to the latest update!
Congratulation, you have just updated your app version. Indeed, we are permanently working to improve. Through this new app version, we have worked on several improvements and bug fixes:
Did you enjoy our work on this latest update?

Is our latest update concerning the app improvements and bug fixes was useful and/or good for you?

Please, if you appreciate our relentless and repeated efforts made every day; so that this application becomes one step after another better; better and better, please do not hesitate to support us and encourage our work by rating the app 5 stars on GooglePlay.

It will be a great support that will help us and encourage us to go further by continuing to give the best of ourselves.

Especially on this new update, there is brand new workspace disposition we are inviting you to try. This new workspace disposition is intended to facilitate quiz editing by allowing you to directly edit QCM files without having to convert them as editable projects first.

Everything fits in a single workspace; no need for two tabs anymore(Questionnaires & Creations).

By clicking here, you can access the settings menu that will allow you to enable but also to discover the new workspace disposition that should simplify your app experience. No worry, you will be able to modify back at any time.
Welcome; ready for the guided tour?

This is your brand new workspace that is built on a single tab and is intended to let you directly edit qcm files existing on your storage disk without having to convert them to editable projects first.\n\nWe will show you essential elements that will be useful to you for a quick start. Are you ready for the guided tour?
your projects awaiting migration!

You see this icon to warn you that you have projects previously present in the \"creations\" tab of your old workspace waiting to be converted into QCM files and migrated into your new workspace. When you\'re ready, click to start their migration; now or later, at your convenience.
That\'s it, everything is said!

The guided tour of your new home page is now complete. We hope you found this little tour useful.\n\nDo not forget to go to the details page of one of your quizzes of your choice in order to discover the novelty that awaits you. ðŸ™‚
Important and major update; please read carefully information below.

This is a major update for Android-11 and upper\'s devices to match the new GooglePlay requirements and that of the android latest versions.

Indeed, as requested by GooglePlay; starting the 1st November 2021, all apps published on GooglePlay have to be fully compatible with Android-11 to keep being updated and accessible from this platform.

According to this new requirement and because of important change regarding the newest Android versions; the QuizMaker app need the permission to manage storage in order to keep being able to list, retrieve, create, edit and manage all qcm files available on your storage disk.

Please accept the required permission to allow QuizMaker to work properly. Feel free to click here or also opt to read this, this or this articles in order to know more about these new changes and requirements from the Google official pages if needed.
Welcome to the new update

Welcome to the new update of QuizMaker that brings full compatibility for Android 11, 12 and upper.\n\nIt enhances user data privacy in order to follow GooglePlay recommendations and requirements in matters of user data, storage access, security and privacy
More privacy

This new update brings more privacy regarding the way the app access to files on your storage on devices running Android 11 and upper.\n\nNow, on Android 11 and upper, in most cases, there is no more need to give to the QuizMaker app a full access permission on all your storage.
Get full control

From this new update, you have full control over which directories and which files the QuizMaker app can access.

Through a short interactive tutorial, we will guide you on initializing your new workspace step by step.

Please follow the tutorial carefully to make sure you don't miss anything.
Welcome to your new workspace!

Before starting, we need you to grant a well-scoped access permission to your current quizzes directory by selecting it through the Android file picker. This directory is located at Phone:/QcmMaker and was the default location for your created quizzes as *.qcm files.

By doing so the app will get a well-scoped access to this specific directory only and will list all your created quizzes as before. There is no more need a full storage permission to manage quiz files on your storage.

In the next step, you will be redirected directly to the target directory waiting you to grant the required access permission.
Important changes!

Indeed, since November 1, 2022, Google play has required all developers (We included) to work to provide a more privacy-friendly alternative when accessing files on the user storage devices if we want to be able to keep publishing new updates for our app on their store: (PlayStore)\n\nThus, we have worked last months to try our best to provide you the best experience in matters of privacy and data safety.

Indeed, since 2021-2022, Google play has required all developers (We included) to work to provide a more privacy-friendly alternative when accessing files on the user storage devices if we want to be able to keep publishing new updates for our app on their store: (PlayStore)\n\nThus, we have worked last months to try our best to provide you the best experience in matters of privacy and data safety.
Hey, wait a moment!
It looks like you are swiping pages too fast. Please ensure you to well read the information we are trying to share with you on these few pages before continuing.

What we are going to show you here are very, very,... very, ...,very... important information. Without knowing these information you will probably miss a lot of important things regarding the app behavior!
I understand that I would miss crucial information
Please ensure you first that you are really wiling to miss the information we are going to share with you.

If you encounter any kind of issue with the app or with your quizzes, just email us; don\'t hesitate. We will respond in the next few hours or minutes. Indeed, it\'s definitely the quickest and most convenient way to get help and genuine information relating to the app\'s behaviour!

At any time, you can email us through the dedicated option from the home screen left side menu drawer.
Always remember!
Keep the app working as before
Patch applied!
Now, let\'s take a look at some interesting new options we have added to your workspace.

A Patch has been applied to keep the app working as before by using your previously granted storage permission. That means the data privacy-based approach recommended by GooglePlay will be ignored. However, this patch will not survive in case you uninstall and reinstall the app (GooglePLay will not allow it).
